tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
** ** **** *** *** **. As I met him in the year of September 2009  ( by unknowingly ) at Prashant Hospital, Bommanahalli for cardiac arrest treatment and till Today I am very much happy about his friendly treatment and advise.

I have lost his number and very badly searched his contact by calling all the hospital s in Bommanahalli area. Finally I found his contact in Google and booked an appointment through PRACTO Application.

I have highly confidence on his treatment and strongly recommend to all my relatives and friends.

I booked an appointment and visited with complaints of breathlessness .He was quick to respond and advised admission for some tests.Later in a very direct  way he told me the cause of my suffering and shifted me to the ICU.i found his approach to my problem very commendable.It was direct and straightforward with no frills .which actually got me ready for facing the issue with courage.I totally appreciate his way and will recommend him to others

i wouldn't recommend this doctor as he is very arrogant. I took my father who is a farmer. we couldn't go back on time and he started shouting at my father. Also I was down with severe fever and shivering and i didn't get the appointment only my father has the appointment. when I requested him as I didn't get the appointment for myself and i have appointment only for my father and I am down with fever, doctor didn't give any medicine instead he suggested to go and have a check up outside. he can't treat me. I never seen any doctor with that much arrogance.
